name: AFFILIATE MLM / PARTY PLAN
author: SocialBug

sections.description:
The plugin enables you to run a MLM or Party Plan affiliate network with WordPress and WooCommerce. This plugin will only work with a valid SocialBug PAID subscription.

CANDY IS HERE!

Backoffice Features:

  1. Affiliate Dashboard
  2. Downline Profiles
  3. Account
  4. Customers
  5. Money
  6. Leads
  7. Social Links
  8. Favorite Products

  67. Notification Alerts (new orders / new direct downline team member and failed payments on auto charge membership fee’s)
  68. Investment Packs or HYIP (gain interest in apy% or fixed over a time period. Dividends can be configured to payout on any cycle. Min withdrawal can be configured and a fee for withdrawing)
  69. Polls

Plugin Features:

  1. Affiliate URL Prefix

Please contact us on the website if you have any support related issues or at support@mlm-socialbug.com

Arbitrary section 1

This plugin will only work with a valid Socialbug PAID subscription.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To
do an automatic install of, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type AFFILIATE MLM / PARTY PLAN and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details
about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking Install Now.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application.

  1. Place the ‘AFFILIATE MLM / PARTY PLAN’ folder in your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate AFFILIATE MLM / PARTY PLAN plugin.
  3. A new menu item would be created in the admin menu called Integrations.
  4. Add name and clik save to autogenerate API KEY for integration.
  5. Under Integrations/Setings add API KEY and PREFIX URL.
  6. Under Integrations/Affiliate Users choose your Affiliate URL Prefix.

Updating

Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.

sections.reviews:
Its fake

By trthrthrthhrhr on December 10, 2022

Its fake, dont waste your time. Plugin need API call to " Bangladesh, Nepal etc.." Its not free, poor company.

Remove This Plugin, if it's NOT free!

By cooldarja51 on January 11, 2022

Why WP allows this type of "Free" plugins to be here? If this plugin does NOT work without a PAID subscription, then it's got nothing to do here. It should be removed ASAP. Shame on you, SocialBug :(

Lots Of Features, Great Price

By bernardogrady on November 21, 2019

The overall experience with the software has been great. The software have support ticket, different types of reports, downloadable reports, commission prediction system etc.. A user friendly MLM software that can be customised to match our needs.

premium plugin should be removed

By cuteantonyraj on January 19, 2019

premium plugin should be removed

Reliable and powerful affiliate software

By christianleonard on December 26, 2018

Socialbug is a comprehensive affiliate management platform chock-full of useful features. It has all the features that an affiliate manager might ever need. The support is great, it is also very customizable. The tracking features are also superb, allowing you to know many details about the users who click or purchase products.

Great MLM software

By gabrielegarcia on January 3, 2018

Socialbug is great MLM software. We really like to use it, great customer support. Our affiliates love our backoffice. Thanks

Top Notch Support and Great Program

By briannajackson on October 12, 2017

Very pleased with support, they are very responsive. Program is easy to use and has all needed features. Very cost effective for a MLM program of this stature. I am very pleased with the options, support and program overall. Very satisfied

FIrst Class program and Support

By nalaninoni on August 7, 2017

Knowing the cost of some MLM/Affiliate software, I thought I would give this add on a shot to start. I am so glad I did! The support is first class, the program easy and thoughtful. The team is helpful and very responsive. The program has more options then I need. I highly recommend this development team and their work. I am impressed!

Very good plugin/software

By carlaplato on May 31, 2017

Just few words: Socialbug have great MLM Affiliate software and awesome customer support!

Good software

By davidwilliamsonfl on March 29, 2017

Affordable price, great support, easy backoffice configuration.

short_description: A plugin to handle several specific methods for integration with SocialBug. Requires a valid SocialBug PAID subscription.
